website_summaries.verdict: Celadrin assists with the reduction of inflammation. Joints and surrounding tissue have an opportunity to become healthier with this supplement.
pros: Celadrin is one of the newest, most effective natural anti-inflammatory compounds that if taken daily can provide pain relief
cons: Your relief won't be immediate and may take up to 30 days to notice positive changes

customer_reviews.title: Definite Improvement!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had Rheumatoid Arthritis for nearly 20 years. After one month of taking this, along with my regular prescriptions, I noticed a definite improvement in overall pain, swelling and mobility, especially on my better days. And I have more of them now as well. I’m excited to see how I’ll feel after continuing to take this daily! I’ve put this on monthly auto refill. I definitely recommend this to anyone suffering with joint issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy O

customer_reviews.title: More People Need to Know About CMO . . .
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. Told my Acupuncturist about this product. And she asked if I could send her some info on it, which I did to her delight. I find that taking CMO/Celadrin for one-month and only once a year, that the benefits linger, and fill a gap that Glucosamine & Chondroitin can't fill. I also supplement with Curcumin/Tumeric and Fish Oil. All the health benefits/side-benefits without all the dangers of Pain meds and other Non-steroid Anti-inflammatories.
customer_reviews.author: KJFlowers

customer_reviews.title: A fine secret formula: "proprietary blend of esterified fatty acids" that works!
customer_reviews.text: It actually provides significant relief of arthritis pain. I ran out of my supply and missed several days and couldn't believe how stiff and painful my joints became. So, I am certain that it really makes a difference!
customer_reviews.author: C. Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Product mislabeled
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could review this product. Unfortunately, not once but twice, I've received 5-HTP instead. Correct label on the bottom but placed on an incorrect bottle. I prefer this brand but have had to switch because of labeling and shipping errors. Please fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Catspaw

customer_reviews.title: It works for certain!
customer_reviews.text: It works for certain! I sit at the computer about 4 hours a day and try my best to get out biking everyday or at least every other. When we travel we don't get to go biking and within about a week I start to notice some minor joint pain in my knees. This stuff gets rid of the pain every time and works within a few hours .. not idea how but it works! I stop taking when the biking picks up.
customer_reviews.author: Discovery

customer_reviews.title: I feel an improvement with my rheumatoid arthritis
customer_reviews.text: I took this before and wasn’t sure if it made a difference but I ordered again and after taking it for like 2 weeks, I feel like I’m not in as much pain. I take it with turmeric and ginger supplements and if I do feel pain I take Tylenol arthritis, no meds with this stuff. I’m going to order more!
customer_reviews.author: Can

customer_reviews.title: This brand didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I tried to save a little money by buying this brand because it was cheaper. Sadly, It did not work at all for me. I had tremendous pain I n my joints and then I remembered I switch. I had to switch back to my more expensive one.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: It really helps!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first supplement I have found to substantially help with my hip OA...I also take Glucosamine Sulfate 2000 mg per day (which may work better in combination with celadrin)....I have been taking for over 2 weeks and noticed a difference within a few days and continued improvement since.
customer_reviews.author: G A GORDON

customer_reviews.title: A must for arthritis! All natural! Worked in days for me.
customer_reviews.text: Best thing for knee arthritis! Without this I could not work - or even walk. Use instead of pain meds! Plus this is all natural. It is beef tallow & well researched as effective for most people. (I am not overweight. Unsure how well it works for heavier people.)

customer_reviews.title: A Blessing for My Painful Knees
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other brands but have found Doctor's Best to be the most effective one for me. I've used for over 10 years and never had any kind of side effect. I can avoid taking anti-inflammatory drugs like Aleve or Motrin when I take this Celadrin on a regular schedule.

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Pill for My Dog
customer_reviews.text: I give this to my elderly dog to ease her stiff joints. She really perked up the first time I gave these to her, and we just haven't stopped. Cetyl-M was recommended to us, but this product is the same thing and more economical as well.

Couldn't find my original brand after Walgreen's quit carrying it in their store, but found Doctor's Best Celadrin and have been using it every day since. I started at one pill a day but later in 2015 upped it to 2 pills a day. It works for me!

customer_reviews.title: Celadrin capsules
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Celadrin for many years as part of an ongoing battle with osteoarthritis. I don't have any clinical proof that my "cocktail' of over-the-counter medicines is effective, or even less which one or ones is effective. Five years ago I was told that I needed a hip replacement and that the pain would grow rapidly and lead me to replacement within a year. I still have not had the replacement and the hip seems less troublesome now than it did five years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Dunipace

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the ones I was taking prior. 5/5 will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Brittnoose

customer_reviews.title: My miracle pill
customer_reviews.text: My brother nearly lost his foot due to an accident. He has 3 plates, 22 screws in his ankle and 27% mobility. Once he found Celadrin he found his pain has been reduced and he takes it faithfully.
customer_reviews.author: Rickie McCandless

customer_reviews.title: so I obviously think it does a great job. I originally got it for my three ...
customer_reviews.text: I've reordered this six times since this past October, so I obviously think it does a great job. I originally got it for my three dogs that compete in sports and now I'm taking it myself along with my 85 year-old mother. The dogs and I take it 2x a day, my mom takes one 3x a day. All those accumulated little nagging aches and stiffness in knees or ankles from years of doing sports go away. My mother insists on calling them her "pain pills" because they work like nothing else did. And on a side, it also seems to fix the touchy bowels in one of my dogs.

customer_reviews.title: A great preventative
customer_reviews.text: I started taking Celadrin 2 years prior to my finally necessary hip replacement. I then stopped taking it. Two years later my other hip started acting up and I started immediately with the Celadrin. That was 2 years ago, and I have yet to feel anymore discomfort in this hip. It's great to be without pain!!!

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy Doctor's best products, and so far have not have any ill effects. I live a VERY active lifestyle. I train MMA five days a week, work as a iron-worker and on weekends run my fabrication business. I need my joints to be in top working shape. So far this product has keep me moving. I will be buying more when I run out.

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product perhaps the best I have used for these ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product perhaps the best I have used for these aging joints. Have used many and Celdrin delivers better than any other products without excessive consumer advertising and "promises". This is, of course, my personal experience, as with any other type of supplement it will affect others differently. That said, if you are dissatisfied with your current joint supplement, give this a try, BUT stay with it for 30 days.

customer_reviews.title: Great for joint ache
customer_reviews.text: I started using Celadrin about 4 years ago for still and painful fingers (mostly early morning) and after 2 years tried living without it and did so successfully for another year or two. Then the demands of packing and lifting and carrying on a big move caused my fingers to flare up again, even worse than before. It took 6-8 weeks, but they're much better now. It's great, too, because it doesn't affect my blood sugar like Glucosamine does.

product_meta.title: Doctor's Best Celadrin, Non-GMO, Gluten Free, Joint Support, 500 mg, 90 Caps
product_meta.description: Size:90 Count (Pack of 1)Celadrin is a proprietary blend of esterified fatty acids that have been shown to benefit joint function and flexibility.* Being a complex molecule consisting of various fatty acids, it is able to penetrate cell membranes, enhancing membrane permeability and cell-to-cell signaling.*
feature_bullets: CELADRIN - Is a proprietary blend of esterified fatty acids that have been shown to benefit joint function and flexibility. The various fatty acids in this complex formula deliver enhanced cell membrane permeability and cell-to-cell signaling.
JOINT HEALTH - Celadrin is a cellular lubricant, that helps maintain healthy joint function
COMFORT & MOBILITY - Promotes flexibility and mobility with a proprietary blend of esterified fatty acids that have been shown to benefit joint function and flexibility.
CLINICALLY STUDIED – Celadrin has been clinically studied for its ability to support healthy joint mobility and overall joint function.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
